name: Pacific Foods Organic Unsweetened Almond Milk, Plant Based Milk, 32 oz Carton
short_description: One (1) 32 oz carton of Pacific Foods Organic Unsweetened Almond Milk
A deliciously creamy plant based milk alternative made with gently roasted, organic almonds
Drink this lactose free milk substitute by the glass, pour it over cereal, blend it in smoothies, or swap it for dairy milk when baking
Gluten free, vegan milk alternative that’s USDA Certified Organic and made with non-GMO ingredients
A good source of Vitamin D, with 10% of the recommended daily value in each 1-cup serving
Shelf stable nut and grain beverages are great in recipes to replace milk, enriched with calcium, vitamin D and riboflavin
Organic
Lactose & cholesterol free
product_description: Add a little plant power to your day with Pacific Foods Organic Unsweetened Almond Milk. This plant based milk alternative takes organic almonds and adds a gentle roast to allow their authentic taste to shine through. The result is a deliciously creamy lactose free milk substitute that’s a pleasure to drink by the glass and blends perfectly in recipes. Pour this non dairy milk alternative over cereal, blend it in smoothies, or swap it for dairy milk when baking. USDA Certified Organic and made with non-GMO ingredients, our gluten-free, vegan milk substitute is a good source of Vitamin D, with 10% of the recommended daily value in each 1-cup serving. Each 32 oz shelf-stable carton contains approximately 4 servings of nut milk and is specially designed to lock in flavor. In addition to organic almond milk, Pacific Foods also offers dairy free milk substitutes made with oats, coconut, cashews and hemp. At Pacific Foods, we're dedicated to making the most nourishing foods possible from quality, carefully sourced ingredients.

name: Almond Breeze Dairy Free Almondmilk, Original, 32 Fl Oz (Pack of 12)
short_description: Contains 12 32 ounce shelf stable containers
Long shelf life – stock up your pantry
A deliciously creamy lactose free alternative to dairy, soymilk and ricemilk
Non GMO Project Verified, soy free, gluten free, calcium enriched
product_description: You don't have to be lactose intolerant to enjoy Almond Breeze, but if you are, you're in for an extra special treat. The creamy smooth texture and hint of almond taste makes this nondairy beverage a stand out at standing in for milk. With half the calories of milk, Almond Breeze is big on taste, light on calories. Ingredients: Almondmilk (filtered water, almonds), cane sugar, Calcium Carbonate, sea salt, Potassium Citrate, sunflower lecithin, gellan gum, vitamin a palmitate, vitamin D2, D Alpha Tocopherol (Natural Vitamin E).

name: Califia Farms - Organic Unsweetened Almond Milk, 32 Oz (Pack of 6), Dairy Free, Vegan, Plant Based, Keto, Vegan, Gluten Free, Non GMO, USDA Organic
short_description: NO OILS, NO GUMS: Califia Organic Almondmilk is made with just three simple ingredients without the need for oils or gums. Just shake it up and enjoy!

CERTIFIED USDA ORGANIC: Califia Organic Almondmilk is USDA certified organic with zero additives. No dairy, oil, gums, gluten, soy, and carrageenan. It’s everything you want in dairy-free almond milk and nothing you don’t.
THREE SIMPLE INGREDIENTS: Purified water, organic almonds, and sea salt. This is plant-based dairy-free goodness in its purest form. No oils and no gums. It’s deliciously simple.

DELICIOUS HOMEMADE TASTE: Califia Farms Organic Almondmilk delivers true homemade taste with organic almonds combined with purified water and sea salt. All the rich smoothness you desire without a trace of dairy.
SHAKE, POUR, LOVE: Settling is natural in high-quality plant-based milks so remember to shake well! Then enjoy the rich, creamy taste created by three simple ingredients.
product_description: Our delicious Organic Almondmilk is made from water, almonds and sea salt. No oils, no gums. Just three ingredients combine to create dairy-free goodness in its purest form, great for cereal, smoothies, cooking and baking. Certified organic.

short_description: NO OILS, NO GUMS: Califia Organic Vanilla Almondmilk is made with just four simple ingredients without oils or gums. Just shake it up and enjoy!

CERTIFIED USDA ORGANIC: Califia Organic Almondmilk is USDA certified organic with zero additives. No dairy, oil, gums, gluten, soy, and carrageenan. It’s everything you want in dairy-free plant milk and nothing you don’t.

DON'T FORGET TO SHAKE: Settling is natural in high-quality plant-based milks so remember to shake well!

name: Silk Shelf-Stable Almond Milk, Unsweetened, Dairy-Free, Vegan, Non-GMO Project Verified, 1 Quart (Pack of 6)
short_description: ADD ALMONDMILK TO YOUR PANTRY: Plain, unsweetened almondmilk tastes great in baking recipes, with cereal, or on its own
SHELF-STABLE: Comes in special packaging for convenient, non-refrigerated storage.Beverage container material: Paper or Cardboard
DELICIOUSLY WHOLESOME: Dairy-, lactose-, and casein-free; absolutely no added sugar, soy, gluten, eggs, or MSG
A NUTRITIONAL ALL-STAR: 50% more calcium than dairy milk ; an excellent source of vitamin E; zero cholesterol; 0g saturated fat per serving; just 30 calories per serving
NON-GMO PROJECT VERIFIED, VEGAN-FRIENDLY ALMONDMILK with no artificial colors or flavors
product_description: Bring the creamy goodness of almondmilk to your pantry with Silk Shelf-Stable Unsweetened Almondmilk. Featuring a pure, silky-smooth taste and just 30 calories per serving, this unsweetened almondmilk is delicious whether it’s poured over cereal, added to your favorite recipes, or enjoyed straight out of the glass. It makes a perfect non-dairy alternative to milk, and is totally free of dairy, soy, lactose, gluten, casein, egg, and MSG. Silk Almondmilk provides vitamin E and contains 50% more calcium than dairy milk. And since it comes in special, shelf-stable packaging, this unsweetened nutmilk will keep fresh at room temperature, unopened, until the date code: no refrigeration necessary! Silk Unsweetened Original Almondmilk: 450mg of calcium per cup; reduced fat dairy milk: 293mg of calcium per cup. USDA National Nutrient Database for Standard Reference. Data consistent with typical reduced fat dairy milk.
